/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. From the vantage point of a car on the road, the viewer's gaze is drawn down the length of the street, flanked by towering buildings on one side and verdant trees on the other. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the clear blue sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The trees, a mix of green and brown, add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. In the distance, a traffic light stands sentinel, guiding the flow of vehicles. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and activity, characteristic of a busy city street.
